admin​

Administration

Scan database​

POST
/api/v1/admin/scan

Scan database and fetch medatada

Parameters​

Query Parameters

force

Scan all scrobbles instead of only unprocessed ones

Typeboolean
coverart_only

Only fetch missing coverart

Typeboolean

Responses​

Launch an asynchronous scrobble scan
application/json

Samples​

Get scrobble by id​

GET
/api/v1/admin/scrobbles/{id}

Parameters​

Path Parameters

id*
Typestring
Required

Responses​

Get a raw scrobble by id
application/json
